title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Competencies: Language Learning Design Applying an Educational Impact Assessment Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Identify three core metrics (engagement, task completion rate, formative assessment scores) to measure language proficiency improvement in educational programs

Learners visualize learner behavior data (login frequency, average dwell time ≥10 minutes for 3+ contents) collected over one week using LMS analytics tools (Google Analytics, xAPI, etc.) and write a data interpretation report including the top three insights.

Within one week, learners propose ≥3 designs for a customized feedback system reflecting educational policies (e.g., Ministry of Health Nursing Education Guidelines) and write a feasibility analysis report (≈500 characters per proposal).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
